pr_title: SAK-44587 Site creation date not being saved

timeline.bodyText: I'd compute the actual value and pass that as a variable.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: return m_createdTime != null ? new Date(m_createdTime.toEpochMilli()) : null;
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Have pushed this change and also applied it to other method
replies.author: bgarciaentornos
